testcase.name: Verify cart updates after adding items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart updates after adding items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.078s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.054s When User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.048s Then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.005s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify cart updates after removing items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart updates after removing items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.922s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.052s When User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.053s And User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.048s And User removes item 'bike light' from the cart ... passed in 1.039s Then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.005s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.946s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.053s When User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.040s And User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.032s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.042s Then User verify the items in cart ... passed in 0.006s When User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.038s Then User should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
